definition: Silizium is a chemical element with atomic number 14. It is a hard, brittle crystalline solid that is commonly used in various technological applications. It is primarily utilized in the production of semiconductors, solar cells, and other electronic devices.

examples.german: Silizium wird in der Elektronikindustrie verwendet.
examples.english: Silicon is used in the electronics industry.

examples.german: Silizium ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil von Solarzellen.
examples.english: Silicon is an important component of solar cells.
Silicon has a high thermal conductivity.
